embeds.title: You have started a new game!!!
embeds.description:
When starting a new game (as you probably noticed) text xhannel ,voice channel and game master text channel are created.

At first only you can see them, typing !add @'username' allows mentioned user to acces that canals (of course they still can’t access game master one) but be careful if you use this command on game master channel it will become accessible for this user.
To deny access to channels for some person type !remove @’username’
To end game type !dgame, be careful because this command will delete channels.

As game master you can access additional tools - randomizers.
!rfight generates random fight with random opponent, to see scheme type !fhelp
!rmeet generates random side quest (his beginning), to see scheme type !mhelp
!rdeath 'user' chooses random death for user (in ‘user’ field you can type whatever you want), to see scheme type !dhelp

embeds.title: Help
embeds.description:
Hello,
This server contains DnD features! You can: throw dices, create channels for your own games (role 'game-master'nedded, ask admin)
and invite people to play with you!

To create game room (role 'game-master' needed)
1. type !sgame 'name of game' to create your own channel and voice channel
2. to add people type !add @'nick' (dont worry no one else than you wont be able to add or remove people)
3. to remove people type !remove @'nick'
4. to end game (and delete channel) type !dgame on this channel

There exists special channel visible only for people wanting to play (having role 'invite-me')
1. To get this role type !waiting
2. To remove this role type !notwaiting

Reacting to message sent on 'class' channel will give you role depending on your reaction
(use as favourite class marker)
1. to remove role (favourite class) type !del 'Role' (mind bigg letters)

To throw dices
1. To dice 4 use !d4
2. To dice any other number use analogic command
3. Avalible dices 4,6,8,10,12,20,100
4. To throw multiple dices use !md4 "count" (analogical every other dice)
5. To throw custom dice type !cd "max value" (when using !mcd "max value" "count")
6. Every number has assigned color

embeds.title: Sheme
embeds.description:
rand persons - rand meeting - rand what happens next

Meetings:
1 comes out from behind the corner/rock/snow mountain etc
2 has fallen from ladder
3 has sneaked on you
4 has run past you
5 is spotted while fighting in street fight
6 is spotted while drinking alcohol
7 is spotted while coming out of the carriage
8 is spotted while coming out of exploding building/cave/etc
9 is shouting to you from window/tree/etc
10 has appeared in splash of magic/energy


People:
1 speaking goat		2 beautiful girl		3 giant 		4 dragon
5 fearful midget	6 city clerk 		7 drunkard	8 policeman
9 important personage escaping from gay orgy (she definitely doesn’t want to be caught)
10 clone of one of you    
11 someone clothed rather strangely with weird glass on his nose (time traveller)
12 young elf		13 just a bitch		14 demon 	15 grandma with roller  (probably has chased someone)
16 main enemy ( if known) 	17 little boy 	18 your mother (mother of one of players)
19 robot/doll		20 cute dog


What happens next:
1. will ask for help in finding someone (depends on person)
2. their gender has been changed suddenly, will ask for help in finding the culprit
3. they were robbed and will ask for help
4. they have sick daughter/sister and will ask for help
5. will try to convince you to change your religion (sectarian)
6. will tell you a story
7. will tell you a joke
8. will want to sell you narcotics
9. has got lost and will ask for help
10. since you seem seasoned man will offer you a job, pulls you towards the dark alley
11. is trying to find an idiot to extort some money and hits on you seeing that you are travellers
12. has thrown to you mysterious package and disappeared, suddenly you are being chased by guardians
13. has changed on of you into frog and after giving to you his next location disappears
14. has taken picture of you and walked away, confused you didn't know what to do, the next day you are on first page of newspaper accused of robbery
15. has teleported you to prison, you are accused of riot
